name: team-attention-plugins
description: Claude Code plugins for power users by Team Attention

plugins.name: agent-council
plugins.description: Collect and synthesize opinions from multiple AI agents (Gemini, GPT, Codex)

plugins.name: clarify
plugins.description: Transform vague requirements into precise specifications through iterative questioning

plugins.name: interactive-review
plugins.description: Interactive markdown review with web UI for visual plan/document approval

plugins.name: say-summary
plugins.description: Speaks a short summary of Claude's response using macOS TTS (Korean/English)

plugins.name: youtube-digest
plugins.description: Summarize YouTube videos with transcript, insights, Korean translation, and quizzes

plugins.name: google-calendar
plugins.description: Multi-account Google Calendar integration with parallel querying and conflict detection

plugins.name: session-wrap
plugins.description: Session wrap-up workflow with multi-agent analysis for documentation, automation, learning, and follow-up

plugins.name: dev
plugins.description: Developer workflow tools: community scanning, technical decision-making

plugins.name: kakaotalk
plugins.description: Send and read KakaoTalk messages on macOS using Accessibility API

plugins.name: doubt
plugins.description: Force Claude to re-validate when you have doubts (!doubt)

plugins.name: gmail
plugins.description: Multi-account Gmail integration - read, search, send, and manage emails with 5-step sending workflow
